channel.title: Robots on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in Robots on Game6r

item.title: Agent Curiosa Rouge Robots
item.description: Some might say that robot games for girls are not a good fit. However, there are exceptions to any rule. Not only are the female characters of iron, so to speak, but they also compete on the dance floor. True, they try not so much to dance each other as to shandarakht in the head with a CD.

item.title: Magical Girl Save The School
item.description: A cute anime girl, the heroine of the game Robots for Girls 5, turned to your beauty salon with a huge request. Together with their friend - the iron man, they go to the carnival, and they just need new costumes. Come up with new images for your friends, thanks to which they will become the stars of the holiday.
